directives.details: Pull canary_batch_b1.json/csv and canary_batch_b2.json/csv; record totals; verify SHA256 per file.
Confirm schema v1.0; run DQ (non_empty, allowed_enums, units_positive, duration_ms_range) per batch; summarize.
Set Go/No-Go with constraints/blockers; submit to exchange/reports/inbox/order-2025-10-15-031-report.json including per-batch results.

summary: Ingest the two new Toyfoundry canary batches; verify SHA256; validate schema v1.0 + DQ per batch; set acceptance; submit report.
